p: The observed and expected number of cases from the final model matched reasonably well for Elunchun, as did the 2-year forecast ( Figure 4A). Figure 4B compares observed numbers of HFRS cases with predicted numbers from the fitted model; the pseudo- R 2 value for the fitted model was 79.43%. The goodness-of-fit analyses showed no significant autocorrelation between residuals at different lags in the final model ( Figure 5).
